backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report containing an empty features list.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing summaries of key frontend source files and their romantic UI features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme variables and dark mode palette for structural site styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling section navigation, music playback, animations, and interactive butterflies.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, login flow, identity persistence, and provider setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook returning no queries since the site is fully static.
frontend/src/index.css: Custom romantic-themed Tailwind styles including gradients, animations, and page-turn effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, and plugins for the romantic UI.
project_state.json: Stores the projectâ€™s current state, listing existing feature modifications, a pending request to revert to the original Sweta version, and metadata such as schema version and project configuration.
